description.p: Make memories in life and never forget them with Journaler, a journaling application that allows you to easily and expressively capture the details and thoughts about your life. Review past entries in new and interesting ways. Stay motivated to keep writing. Easily export your data when needed.

ul.li: Support for multiple journals.
Application-wide password protection.
Markdown writing support.
Add images to each journal entry.
Tagging support.
Expressive and robust journal entry review features, including image review mode.
Fullscreen distraction-free writing and review mode.
Template support.
Motivation support with entry length goals, awards, inspirational quotes, and customizations.
Built-in entry trash support.
Import from XML
Export to XML and JSON.
Added ability to add new entries to past dates.
Added ability to move a journal entry to a different journal within the content panel.
Added ability to move a journal entry to a different date within the content panel.
Added sidebar entry count information (including entry stream count).
Added ability to bulk edit entries in the review sidebar (includes moving, trashing and tagging features).
Added new image review panel.
Added ability to sort review entries oldest or newest first.
Added preference option to change the spell checker language.
Added new inspirational quotes.
Changed to allow multiple entries per day.
Added image date and original location information to image viewer.
Minor UI enhancements to improve application use and appearance.
Fixed issue with using non-PNG images.
Fixed tag matching issue in review mode.
Fixed bug where editing an entry before the current day could cause its contents to not get saved when a new date is chosen.
Fixed application crash that could happen if there are no suggestions for a misspelled word.
Adding launchable tag.
Fixing release dates in appdata.
Fixed UI issues when switching from distraction-free editing to normal editing mode.
